name: ObviousFacts
0:
”Alexa, ask Obvious Facts for a fact.”
”Alexa, ask Obvious Facts to tell me an obvious fact.”
”Alexa, use Obvious Facts.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: obvious facts
des:
Obvious facts gives obvious statements or truisms - like a fortune cookie without the numbers.

This skill does not yet take advantage of cards for Echo Show.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
